name: Super Myth
description:
Super Myth, an epic quest of a hero out to slay the smug king!

Can you grind for the hundreds of hours needed to defeat the smug king hidden in his land of evil? Or will you find an """"alternative solution""" to save both your time and sanity? And where are those orbs of power anyways? Don't tell me they haven't been implemented yet!

(An attempt at the theme, "Breaking the rules", inspired by gameshark, and noclipping during speedruns.)

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move around!

Z: Select Stuff!

Other controls: It'll tell you when they come up!

Credits:

development: masque, nyx_sys

art: nyx_sys, paroTB

Still to be finished!
